metadata.name: A Splash of Colour Part 1
metadata.description:
About this NFT: "A Splash of Colour Part 1" shows a close-up of a woman who is being splashed with paint. Her hair is coated with blue paint, contrasting with the yellow and pink backdrop.

Resolution: 1664 x 2304 px.

Media: This piece was created digitally by painting over AI generative image(s).

About the Collection: A Splash of Colour is a series of portraits of men and woman who have been splashed with brightly coloured paint. The images capture a moment in time that is bold, striking and chaotic. All images in this collection were created digitally.
